string.value: There's a ghost at #b#m261000000##k! A lab ghost, #b#p2111006##k! Apparently, even a ghost like him needs help...

#p2111006# told me he couldn't stand being next to #r#o6110301##k, and wanted me to slay some #o6110301# for him. He freaks me out even more! But since a request is a request, I'll have to slay them first. \n\n#o6110301# #r#a33191##k
#p2111006# told me as recent as a while ago, some alchemist entered this place and worked hard at his research, and yet he hasn't shown up since the explosion.

This lab is rarely visited by anyone these days, so I have been paying attention to you the moment you stepped foot in this lab. I just didn't think I'd be able to carry out a conversation with you. I'm glad I got to talk to you. To be honest, I've been living in fear these days.\r\n#b#L0#What's scaring you?#l
What's scary? Look around! I see a room full of #r#o6110301##k! It really scares me to death! Look at them! They are transparent! \r\n#b#L0#(Yikes... you're scaring me much much more!)#l

You do look quite powerful, by the way. I, Parwen, can see that you are a person of immense strength, so powerful that I can't believe you're an alchemist. With that... can you eliminate some #o6110301#s for me?

Sniff sniff... Thank you so much. I am so glad to have met such a helpful young warrior. I'd appreciate it if you can eliminate #r200 #o6110301#s#k. It shouldn't be too hard. What? It's easy? I knew you'd Say that.
Sniff sniff... that's terrible. I was just glad to find a friend whom I could talk to, and now you betray me like this?
Ohh! You did manage to defeat all the #o6110301#s! That's just amazing! Much more useful than the last alchemist that came!

Hmm? The alchemist that was here before? Ahh... well, there was this fella that conducted experiments here not too long ago. He was so determined and focused in his work that I was too intimidated to talk to him. I wondered why he'd work on the Life Alchemy with such disdain for safety...
What happened to him? I don't know. He stopped coming after a while. All the reports on the experiments have been removed by others, and after that, no one used this lab ever again... I wonder why.
Anyway, I think you're much much more courteous and receptive than that other alchemist. It's good to find a chat buddy , you know. Hahaha... hope to see you again here.
Look at those #r#o6110301#s#k! Ahhhhhh! Please get rid of them! #r200#k of them!
